page.title: 05SHOPPING IN BREICH VALLEY
page.content: In our area there is not a big choice of shops.All three villages have general stores and a Post Office. It is possible to buy papers, small gifts, sweets and groceries.However there is not a wide choice and goods are quite expensive. To buy clothes, hardware, electrical goods etc.{people}have to {travel}to one of the bigger towns such as{Bathgate or Livingston. Livingston is particulary popular for {weekly}food shopping because it has a selection of large supermarkets and because one of the supermarkets runs a free bus from this area on Tuesdays and Fridays. The only chemist shop in the area is in Stoneyburn.
